SYNTAX: SpreadsheetSetFooter(spreadhsheetobj, left footer, center footer, right footer)
SEEALSO: SpreadsheetGetCellComment, SpreadsheetFormatCell, SpreadsheetGetCellFormula, SpreadsheetGetCellValue, SpreadsheetMergeCells, SpreadsheetSetCellFormula, SpreadsheetSetCellValue
DESCRIPTION: Adds a footer to the specified worksheet.
USAGE: The footer that you add appears on the printed worksheet document.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: The Excel spreadsheet object to which to add the footer.
Adds the footer in the left side of the worksheet.
Adds the footer in the center of the worksheet.
Adds the footer in the right side of the worksheet.
